title: US Poverty Rates Graph - Later Development

content.prompt: Which of the following factors contributed to the trend depicted in the graph after 1979 ?

choices.label: The stagnation of real wage growth for working- and middle-class Americans
The decrease in military spending and work in military contracting
The raising of federal tax rates on companies and individuals
The decline in employment in the service sector of the economy

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
